attributes.action: secure endorsement from CWDC for the 'Working with Young People' Foundation Degree nationally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The experience and accessibility of the degree, practical, theory and work based learning, contributes to a professional development that enhances the practitioners understanding, enabling them to become more articulate and skilled in the workplace. The student through work place assessment, reflects and develops both personally and contributes to the work ongoing in the field.
CWDC need to recognise and endorse the Working with Young People Foundation Degree and value the commitment of current students on the courses at present, only obtaining local recognition of their education and learning. This also would support national recognition within the terms and conditions of employment for youth workers obtaining the Foundation Degree.
